A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I used to think Phantom Menace was the worst Star Wars movie\, but now I'm not so sure.  The only reason I rated it as high as I did is because the cinematography\, CGI\, special effects and score are absolutely incredible.  There are several scenes where you will drop your jaw in sheer  awe.  The actual story leaves a LOT to be desired.  There are entire scenes that haze zero purpose in the movie and the Porgs are a distraction throughout.  To put it simply\, I will not watch another movie written by Rian Johnson.  He has single handedly destroyed everything true Star Wars fans hold dear.  An awful story\, don't waste your money on a cinema ticket.   Wait till it hits blueray then watch it.
